title: Dedication to Hercules Nouritanus by Caius Fannius and the Frentrani

provenanceFound._:
Found in excavation in March 2008 in secondary deposition, having been
                            re-used in antiquity on the street bordering the north-east side of the so-called 'insula
                            romana' villa on Capo Boeo.

repository._: Museo archeologico regionale Lilibeo Marsala - Baglio Anselmi
